p: Based on the findings of the current study, it can be concluded that using ZCEO at a concentration of 0.3% alone or at concentrations of 0.1 and 0.3% in combination with lysozyme successfully increased the shelf life of Balkan‚Äêstyle fresh sausage under MAP during storage at the refrigerated condition. To summarize, these natural green preservatives may have this potential to be applied in fresh sausage without any adverse sensory properties.
